name: A Story of Power
description:
GameJam Project for the HackTheMidlands 5.0

A Story of Power is the story of Z6-PO, a robot created to help humans getting their power back! He will fight, learn, and grow… Some say that an unlimited power source exists somewhere in these lands… Could he picture everything he could do with that? Not for now. But remember… He’ll learn.

How to play:

Use WASD to move, hold shift to run, left click to attack, E to talk to villagers and activate the power plants (there will be a sound when properly activated),  R to use your batteries.

Kill enemies to get batteries. Survive!

The dialogues will change after each power plant activation, make sure to not lose anything of the story!

[Known issue: If you glitch through the ground, just wait for the battery to drain and you will respawn in the village without losing your story progress]
